Package nl.codevs.strinput.system

Class Context

java.lang.Object
nl.codevs.strinput.system.Context
public final class Context extends Object
Environment variables available on a per-thread basis.
  • touch(StrUser) store a user for the current thread
  • touch(StrCenter) store a center for the current thread
  • user() get the current StrUser
  • center() get the current StrCenter
  • settings() get the current StrSettings (based on center())
Since:
v0.1
